government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " "Ensure significantly large differences in the cost of vehicle excise duty between low-emission cars and vehicles that emit large amounts of carbon dioxide are brought in at the next budget. This would follow the lead by the Mayor of London and Richmond Council who are effectively applying the 'polluter pays' principle to give clear rewards to those who choose cleaner cars and penalties to those who don't."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11907.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Environment Secretary Hilary Benn has written a message exclusively for people who recently signed petitions on the No10 website about climate change.

Mr Benn highlights the UK Government's commitment to seeking international agreement on a post-2012 climate change framework, and encourages petitioners, their families, and friends, to use the new CO2 Calculator.

Read the message here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13496.asp
